name: Switch 3D
description:
The game takes place from the point of view of a scientist in a seemingly abandoned facility. Everybody is missing and he has seemingly no way out. Using the aid of prototype technology, this scientist must switch between two (terrible) dimensions and utilize every possible aid to traverse and escape to the outer levels of the facility. Ultimately leading him to the surface where he is able to locate a helicopter and escape to freedom.

Source Code - https://github.com/cfarrell02/Switch-3D
